synopsis.text: Okarun, a UFO enthusiast, and Momo Ayase, a believer in spirits, form an unlikely alliance after Momo rescues Okarun from bullies. Despite their contrasting beliefs, they engage in a friendly debate, each determined to prove the existence of their respective paranormal entities. Momo, hailing from a family of spirit mediums, heads to a deserted hospital, a known UFO sighting location. Meanwhile, Okarun ventures into a reputedly haunted tunnel. Their individual investigations lead to astonishing encounters with inexplicable paranormal activities. As they grapple with these extraordinary experiences, Momo discovers her latent spiritual powers, and Okarun acquires the power of a curse. Amidst these supernatural challenges, a tender romance blossoms between them. Their journey through adolescence is marked by occult battles, otherworldly creatures, and the sweet unfolding of young love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
